The College stands as the inspiration of higher education, which steers academically intimidated environs in its voyage towards knowledge. It is the only higher education centre situated between Tirur and Guruvayoor in the coastal belt of Malappuram district, the college has set out a great passage to lead a community, which was wrapped in the whirlpool of ignorance and had plunked in to the unfathomable trench of neglect, to the green shores of learning.

The programs offered at the college is approved by AICTE and affiliated with the Calicut University (CU).

Mar Augusthinose College is a private college that was established in the year 1995. The college is part of many institutions that are being managed by the Eparchy of Pala and St. Augustine Forane Church. The college is affiliated with Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala.

The Carmelite sisters of Jai Christo CMC Education Agency manage the college and comes under Palakkad’s Bishops’ religious jurisdiction. It has received a reaccreditation from NAAC at grade A. The college has an expert faculty of more than 250 members who teach more than 20 courses in the college. Admissions are done through the University of Calicut Centralised Admission Process.

College_Summary: Established in 1965, NSS College is a Government aided Arts & Science College owned and managed by Nair Service Society. The College is affiliated to University of Calicut and is one of the oldest institutions of higher learning in Malappuram District. It has been approved by AICTE and accredited Grade ‘B’ by NAAC. Presently, the college offers eight UG and three PG courses. A doctoral course in History is also available. The admission to all the courses is merit based. The college has overall 15 departments.

NSS College Ottapalam is one of the renowned Art and Science colleges established in the year 1961 and has been accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ status. The college offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate programs affiliated from Calicut University. The campus provides all facilities for over all development of students.

NSS Hindu College was established in 1947 under the banner name of Nair Service Society. It is located in Changanacherry and is the earliest among the higher education institutions in the region. The college is accredited with Grade ‘A’ by NAAC. The college has been honored with the Global Education Excellence Award for the Best Degree College, Kerala -2018.

Naipunnya School of Management, Cherthala was established in 2003 and is affilated to the University of Kerala and is one of the best management colleges in Kerala. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Hotel Management, Computer Finance, English Literature and many more. Admission to both UG and PG courses are on the basis of previous years qualifying examination.

College_Name: National Institute of Speech and Hearing, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: National Institute of Speech and Hearing (NISH) is an autonomous institution located in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, working relentlessly for the education and rehabilitation of individuals suffering from speech-language and hearing impairments. It is a self financed institution which is established in 1997 by the Kerala State Social Welfare Department. It is affiliated to the University of Kerala. It has accreditation from the Rehabilitation Council of India as an Excellent Institution and by NAAC with A Grade.

College_Summary: Nirmala College in Muvattupuzha, ranked 17th by the NIRF in the 2017 rankings, is an affiliation of MGU Kottayam offering various courses in the streams of Arts, Science, Commerce, and Tourism. Courses offered under these streams are BA, B.Com, B.Sc, BCA, M.Sc, MCA, MHRM, MTA, etc. The college also provides Doctoral and Certification courses to students. Admissions at Nirmala College are entrance-based. Interested applicants are required to apply online on the official website along with an application fee of INR 600 for the UG admissions and INR 1000 for the PG admissions. Candidates interested in Ph.D. programs are required to follow the guidelines as provided by the MGU Kottayam.

College_Summary: Payyanur college is a B+ NAAC accredited institution. The college offers 14 undergraduate, 4 postgraduate, and 3 Ph.D. courses with a lot of facilities and amenities for the students for an all-round growth in their careers. The college has an approved intake of 578 seats for undergraduate programs and 61 for the PG programs. The college provides admissions on the basis of merit and qualifying examinations. Applicants seeking admission to the institute may apply online as well as offline. Along with the curriculum infrastructure, the college provides various facilities like different laboratories, AV center, and gym.

College_Summary: Sanatana Dharma College, established in 1946, is accredited with an A+ Grade by NAAC. It offers both undergraduate and postgraduate courses in science, arts, and commerce, with a number of specializations. In addition, research facilities are also available for those who wish to gain a Ph.D. degree.

College_Name: SIBGA Institute of Advanced Studies Irikkur, Kannur

College_Summary: The Sree Kerala Varma College was established with a mission of strong commitment to bring up the students hailing from rural and semi-urban areas, with poor socio-economic backgrounds, on the same grounds with those from better facilitated and  endowed urban areas.  The college strives to make the students competent to meet the challenges of the modern world with full social commitment and confidence. Sree Kerala Varma College is one of the most well-known educational institutions in Kerala and is the biggest Science and Arts College under the University of Calicut. The college aims to preserve the best traditions of progressive higher education, which ensures complete freedom of expression to encounter diverse ideological preoccupations. In both co-curricular and curricular activities, the college works to bring out the best talents of the students.

Sree Krishna College is located at Guruvayur in the district of Thrissur. Established in 1964, it is affiliated with the University of Calicut. The college offers students 13 undergraduate courses, and five postgraduate courses. Known for the departments of BA, B. Sc, and B. Com, the college is presently home to 422 students. Admission into courses at the college is merit-based.

Sree Narayana College is a renowned institute in Kannur District, Kerala. It is affiliated to Kannur University. It has been accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ Grade. The institute offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the fields of Arts, Science and Commerce. Admission to the college is done purely on the basis of marks obtained in the previous qualifying examination.

Sree Narayana College was established in year 1967 and is affiliated to University of Calicut. The College was accredited by NAAC. The College offers UG, PG, PhD programmes in numerous specializations. It also offers Diploma and Certification programmes for interested students. The College was placed in 150-200 rank band. In 2020, the NIRF ranked the College at #151 position among top Colleges in India

Sree Narayana College, Cherthala, Kerala, established in 1964, is a general degree college situated at Cherthala, Alappuzha district in Kerala. The college is affiliated with Kerala University and it is also recognized by the University Grants Commision(UGC). It is accredited from NAAC. An annual quality assurance report (AQAR) has been prepared by SN college where an aspirant can get more information from that about the college. The Guru’s preaching, “One Caste, One Religion and One God for man” is upheld in all realms of the function of the Institution.

Sree Narayana College, Chempazhanthy, established in 1964, is located at Chempazhanthy which holds historical relevance as it is the birthplace of the much-revered Guru and social reformer Sree Narayana Guru. The College was established by the Sree Narayana Trust, Kollam. Its motto is to provide quality education to students whilst showcasing high moral values based on the principles of the guru Sree Narayana Guru.

College_Name: Sree Narayana College for Women, Kollam
College_Summary: Sree Narayana College For Women situated in Karbala, Kollam ,Kerala -691001 is affiliated to University Of Kerala . It was established in 1951 as a college for women and the college was named after social reformer, philosopher and saint Sree Narayana Guru.

College_Summary: Shree Narayana Mangalam (S. N. M.) College, Ernakulam, Kerala, The Shree Narayana Mangalam College was established with a mission to uplift and liberalize the oppressed and weaker section of the society by providing them education and make them understand to work in a unity in order to achieve superiority and satisfaction in their lives. The college has a vision to help the progress of a new young generation minds that are responsible are honest and dedicated to social reformation. The college simply stresses on the development of such young minds that have the ability to work in unity with mutual understanding to achieve the social aim of equality and liberty. The college simply believes in preparing the students who can be advantageous and responsible towards the society.

College_Name: Sree Neelakanta Government Sanskrit College Pattambi, Palakkad

College_Summary: Sree Sankara College Kalady is affiliated with Mahatma Gandhi University, Kerala. It offers Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses with multiple specializations along with Diploma/Certificate courses to students. It also provides admission to Ph.D. scholars, Department of Commerce, Economics, Microbiology, and Sanskrit are approved Research Centres under Gandhi University. Admission to all the courses is merit-based and aspirants are required to fill an online application form through the official website. The college offers various internships and field projects to its students to enhance their academic as well as their professional skills.

Sree Sankara Vidyapeetom College, established in 1967, is situated in the village Irampuram, 30 km from Cochin City. It was named after the great saint Sree Sankaracharya and accredited with a grade ‘A’ by NAAC with a score of 3.1 in 2006.

College_Summary: Sree Vidyadhi Raja NSS College Vazhoor, Kottayam, Kerala was established in the year 1965 with the aim of meeting the educational requirements of the economically backward communities. The college is situated in Theerthapadapuram, in the heart of a remote village. Aided by the Government of Kerala, the college is recognized by UGC and is managed by the Nair Service Society. Sree Vidyadhi Raja NSS College Vazhoor is NAAC accredited ‘B’ college and is affiliated to MG University.

College_Name: Sri Vyasa NSS College Wadakkanchery, Thrissur
Sri C. Achutha Menon Government College, Thrissur

College_Summary: St. Paul's College, Ernakulam, Kerala was established in 1964. The college offers admission in various courses like BA, B.Com, B.Sc, M.A, M.Com, M.Sc. Various facilities provided are Medical Support Systems, Gym, Sports Complex, Canteen, Transport Facility, Library & Information Center, Practical Lab, Alumni Services, IT Centers, Auditorium and etc. The admissions are accepted through an online submission application on the basis of their eligibility and merit certificate. The companies that come for placements or for internships are Oyo rooms, EY, KPMG, etc.

St Xavier’s College Thumba, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala is a public college established in 1964. It is approved by UGC and is affiliated to the University of Kerala. The college offers several UG and PG courses across different specializations. At the UG level it offers B.Sc, BA, and B.Com while at PG level it offers M.Com and M.Sc. Admissions to the college are granted on the basis of merit.

Established in 1965, St. George’s College Aruvithura, Kottayam Kerala offers Self-financing and Aided - Undergraduate and Post-graduate courses in Science, Arts and Commerce. Admission is to these courses is done through CAP by online registration. Admission to community quota, management quota, sports quota and handicap quota are done at the college level. As per the merit list, candidates are called by the college to attend the interview. Graduates from the college are placed in companies like TCS, Infosys , Sutherland Global, ICICI bank, Axis bank, Times of India, FSL, Joy Alukkas etc come for campus placements.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Vocational Studies [B.Voc.] (Food Processing Technology)

College_Summary: St. Stephen’s College, Pathanapuram, Kerala was established in 1964. The college has been a part of constant upgradations offering numerous courses of Undergraduate and Postgraduate, namely under the department head such as Zoology, Mathematics, Economics, Chemistry, Botany, Physics, etc. It offers BA, B.Sc, B.com, M.Sc, and Ph.D. programs. The admission is based on merit and applications are available online.

Established in 1964, St. Xavier’s College for Women is located in Aluva, Kerala. The college is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University and currently conducts 13 UG and 6 PG programs along with M. Phil and PhD. degree programs.  The college also offers various add-on programs and computer courses.  B.A, B.Sc and B.Com courses are offered at the undergraduate level and M.A, M.Sc and M.Com programs at the postgraduate level. Applicants are required to register online through UG-CAP and PG-CAP facilities at MGU. UG Admission for the various reserved categories is done online via the official college website. Application for admission is an online process managed by MGU and the college.

College_Summary: St. Thomas Arts and Science College, Ernakulam was established in 2006 and running under the Malankara Jacobite Syrian Christian Education Trust. The college is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University. The College offers Bachelor and Master degree in Arts and Commerce. The main aim of the college is to provide good and healthy educational environment to the students so that they become a competent, responsible and wholesome individual with a deep sense of goodwill and social commitment. Every year the college conducts so many co-curricular and extra-curricular activities for over-all development of the students like Physical strength, mental power, Personality development, etc.

Sullamussalam Science College is a private, co-educational college located in Kerala. It is affiliated to University of Calicut and it is re-accredited at Grade ‘A’ by NAAC. The college offers BA, B.Sc, B.Voc and B.Com at the UG level. While courses like M.A, M.Sc and M.Com are offered at the PG level. Admission to Sullamussalam Science College is based on merit. Candidates can obtain application form via online mode from the website.

College_Summary: Zamorin's Guruvayurappan College is an aided college in Kozhikode, Kerala, India offering Graduation and Post Graduation courses. The college offers a total of 12 UG and 9 Pg programs, in addition to 5 research programs. This includes BA, BBA, B.Sc and B.Com at the UG level and M.Sc, MA and M.Com at PG level. Admissions to these courses are done on the basis of the Common Entrance Test conducted by the University of Calicut followed by counseling based on merit list.

Thunchan Memorial Government College is one of the best government colleges in Kerala that offers various programs to interested students. The college was established in 1980 and was inaugurated by the then Education Minister of Kerala, Sri. Baby John. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi, and is accredited NAAC grade B+. This college is affiliated with the University of Calicut. Originally the college was named as Government college, but later it was renamed Thunchan Memorial Government College in the honor of the father of Modern Malayalam Language in 1981.
Union Christian College (UCC) is located in Aluva and is considered as one of the top colleges in Kerala. It was established in 1921.

College_Summary: Vimala college is a roman catholic college located in Thrissur city of Kerala state, India for women. The college was established in 1967, bifurcated from St. Mary’s College and affiliated to the University of Calicut. The college is accredited by NAAC and approved by UGC. Vimala college offers 18 UG and 13 PG programmes along with other certificate and short-term courses and is a Centre for Research in English, Physics, Commerce, Social work, and Economics. Admissions in the college are merit-based for most of the courses.

College_Summary: KMCT Ayurveda Medical College is a private college located in Kozhikode, Kerala. The college is duly recognized by CCIM (Central Council of Indian Medicine) and affiliated to the Kerala University of Health Science (KUHS). This college was established in 2006 by Kunhitharuvai Memorial Charitable Trust to provide quality education in the field of medical sciences to the students.

College_Name: Kerala Agricultural University, College of Agriculture Vellayani, Thiruvananthapuram
College_Summary: College of Agriculture (CoA) at Vellayani ,Thiruvananthapuram is regarded as one of the top level institutions in India for agricultural research and education. The college along with the two other campuses under the faculty of Agriculture has been best in romoting and providing quality education and skill training for agricultural graduates and farmers in Kerala. The instructional farm at vellayani also helps to organize work experience programs for the students at graduate level and provides space for PG and PhD students  for practicals and trials. With the help of CoA in the agricultural University , the agricultural education and research in the state underwent tremendous changes and developments. The college has become the main centre of the agricultural research and education in the southern state.

College_Summary: SCMS School of Masscom Studies, Kochi is running under the Prathap Foundation for Education & Training. It is a unit of SCMS Group of Educational Institutions. The college is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University. It is approved by Public Relations Society of India (PRSI). The college offers Postgraduate Diplomas in Public Relations, Advertising and Journalism.

College_Name: St Joseph College of Communication - [SJCC], Changanacherry
College_Summary: St. Joseph College of Communication (SJCC), Changanassery, Kerala, was established in 2004. This is the first university-affiliated media college in South India. It is a Christian minority self-financing education institution affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University (MGU), Kottayam. The college offers numerous courses to THE students covering various specializations like Multimedia, Print, Arts, Visual Arts, Animation, Cinema & Television, Graphic Design, and Digital Editing. Admission into this college is based on the aptitude test followed by an interview conducted by the college itself. The institution got ranked at 16th for Mass Communication by Outlook in the year 2020.

College_Summary: Educare Institute of Dental Sciences has state-of-the-art facilities and experienced faculty members offering students hands-on training for academic excellence. EIDS also has strong ties with the international dental community and has academic collaborations with universities in the United States and Europe. Educare Institute of Dental Sciences claims to offer 100% training and placement opportunities to its students. The institute also offers various scholarships and financial assistance to meritorious students. EIDS offers hostel accommodation, a well-stocked library, 24 x 7 security, and various other facilities on its campus.

College_Summary: St. Gregorious Dental College, Ernakulam is one of the renowned college in the field of Dental Science. The dental institution was set up with a motive of finding and evolving new methods to add new dimensions to the social and religious commitment. The college is run and funded by Malankara Jacobite Syrian Christian Education Trust. The aim if the institution is to provide quality education and to promote and develop excellence in intellectual, spiritual and professional world. The college in order to achieve its aim has a number of well versed postgraduate teachers and paramedical staff. The college offers the most sophisticated treatment in the specialities of Dental Surgery.

College_Summary: Kerala Law Academy (KLA Thiruvananthapuram) was established in 1967 and it is the first private law college in Trivandrum, Kerala. The college provides courses at the UG level in the field of legal studies as a BA.LLB, B.Com LLB, and LLB. Along with the undergraduate programs, the college offers PG level courses like LLM and MBL. Admissions to most courses are merit-based while for others, an interview is also conducted. The university conducts its own entrance exam for admissions to BA LLB, BCom LLB, and LLB.

College_Summary: Amrita School of Pharmacy is an important part of Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham. It is located in the city of Kochi, Kerala. The school was established as a Center of Excellence in the year 1997 with the aim of imparting quality education in the field of Pharmaceutical Sciences. Amrita School of Pharmacy is recognized by PCI and AICTE. The school is accredited by the NAAC with ‘A’ grade. It offers B.Pharm, M.Pharm, Pharm.D, and Ph.D. in Pharmaceuticals.

College_Summary: National College of Pharmacy [NCP] is located in Kozhikode, Kerala and has been established in 1996 by Dr.K.Moidu in Calicut city of Kerala. The college is affiliated to Kerala University of Health Science (KUHS) and approved by the Pharmacy Council Of India, AICTE & Govt. of Kerala. It is one of the leading pharmacy colleges in the region. Nurtured and supported by KUHS, the college successfully runs courses from D.Pharm to Pharm.D including various specializations in postgraduate levels.

Nirmala College of Pharmacy, Muvattupuzha, Kerala was established in the year 2004. The Nirmala College of Pharmacy is a Christian minority institute located at Muvattupuzha, Kerala. College_Summary: Government Medical College (GMC) Thrissur situated at Kerala is one of the leading medical institutes of the country having a history of meritorious health care since its establishment. It remains the premier medical institution in this part of the state, providing medical services to patients in three districts of Kerala and areas near Tamil Nadu. It is under the control of the Directorate of Medical Education, Government of Kerala. UG and PG courses are being offered here with the selection criteria being the NEET UG/PG depending upon the opted course.

College_Summary: The Government Medical College, Kottayam (GMCK) was established in 1962. The institution is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI) and is affiliated to Mahatma Gandhi University. It was originally affiliated to Kerala University. The college offers many courses under the UG and PG levels in various fields like Anatomy, Paediatrics, Ophthalmology, Biochemistry, Microbiology, and many more. The admission to any of the courses is through qualifying for the entrance exam like NEET or AIPMT. The college has a highly esteemed faculty and various facilities to make its students comfortable and help them focus on their studies.

College_Summary: KMCT Medical College, Manassery was established in 2008 in Manassery, Kerala to create a hub of healthcare, education, and research. The medical college is affiliated with Kerala University of Health Sciences. The Undergraduate MBBS Course was accorded recognition by the Central Government in 2013. The college also offers post-graduate MS and MD courses in Orthopedics and Pharmacology. The students are shortlisted on merit-basis and entrance exams (NEET) results. Applicants looking for admission to the college are required to apply online and appear for the entrance exam.

College_Summary: Karuna Medical College is a private college established in 2006 in Palakkad, Kerala. It is a part of the Karuna Institute of Medical Sciences. The courses offered include MBBS, B.Sc, B. Pharm, MD, M.Pharm, and Pharm D. Admissions to the MBBS and MD courses are made on the basis of the NEET-UG and NEET-PG examinations respectively and the subsequent counselling processes. The admissions to the remaining courses are based on merits achieved in the qualifying examination.

College_Summary: The Department of Science and Technology of the Govt. of India has recognized the Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology, Trivandrum (Also known as SCTIMST TRIVANDRUM) as an institute of national importance by an Act of Parliament when it was provided with the status of a University in 1980. Sree Chitra Institute of Medical Science courses includes only PG courses such as M.Tech, Diploma, PG Diploma, MD, etc. The students, who have secured a minimum of 60% in their UG or PG exams can choose from a variety of masters’ and doctorate courses in the medical field and apply online for admission to the institute. The application mode of the college remains online and the applications are required to apply for admission through the official website of the college.
